By the way, do you guys know what's the difference between...
..."I envy her" and "I'm jealous of her" is?
Alright. "I am jealous of her" has a very negative tone.
It means that you're really, really upset about what's happening to that person.
So, don't use "I'm jealous of her",...
This is a really good meaning.
It means that you have respect for what's happening to that person.
So, if something good has happened to that person,...
...and you wanna be like them say, "I envy her", okay?
